title: Yeast gene expression — yeast_gene_exp
text: Expression S. cerevisiae genes chemostat growth nutrient limitation.

title: Yeast gene expression — yeast_gene_exp
text: tibble 199,296 rows 4 columns: systematic_name systematic gene name nutrient limiting nutrient rate growth rate exp gene expression value

title: Yeast gene ontology — yeast_go_terms
text: Gene ontology terms S. cerevisiae genes

title: Yeast gene ontology — yeast_go_terms
text: tibble 5,537 rows 4 columns systematic_name systematic gene name common_name common gene name go_molecular_function GO molecular function go_biological_process GO biological process

what: yeastgenes: Yeast gene expression and associated protein function data — yeastgenes-package
title: yeastgenes: Yeast gene expression and associated protein function data — yeastgenes-package
text: Provides gene expression data Brauer et al. (PMID 17959824) *Saccharomyces cerevisiae* grown nutrient limitation chemostat. Also provides data Saccharomyces Genome Database.

title: yeastgenes: Yeast gene expression and associated protein function data — yeastgenes-package
